alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 10 at 9:33AM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River at Harwood affecting Cass County. .Due to recent rainfall from thunderstorms, the Sheyenne River at Harwood is beginning to see a response. Anticipating a jump up to Minor flood stage this evening and and Moderate flood stage by late Thursday. The river is expected to peak within Moderate flood stage across the weekend before falling back toward Minor flood stage early next week. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sheyenne River at Harwood. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 86.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 82.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening and continue rising to a crest of 87.9 feet early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 84.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
